thread.title: Something Just Like This - The Chainsmokers & Coldplay
thread.title_full: Something Just Like This - The Chainsmokers & Coldplay

title: Something Just Like This - The Chainsmokers & Coldplay
text: Formed: 2012 in New York, NY Genre: Dance Years Active: '10s A production duo featuring Andrew Taggart and Alex Pall, the Chainsmokers mix indie, dance, and pop into a chart-topping sound that spawned hits like "Roses" and "Don't Let Me Down." Pall and Taggart first made a name for themselves by creating remixes of their favorite indie bands that garnered tens of millions of streams. The duo released its official debut single "#Selfie," which celebrated and skewered 2010s narcissism, in January 2014. The track's bouncy beats and self-obsessed words hit number... Top Albums and Songs by The Chainsmokers 1.
